English: He who comes is surely ill-intentioned, no-one well-meaning will come (idiom).

h.b: ㄌㄞˊ　ㄓㄜˇ　ㄅㄨˋ　ㄕㄢˋ　ㄕㄢˋ　ㄓㄜˇ　ㄅㄨˋ　ㄌㄞˊ

e: `如~：「`對頭~`來~`了~，`正~`所謂~：『`來者不善，善者不來~。』`我們~`還是~`快~`走~`吧~！」
d.f: （`諺語~）`來的~`人~`不懷好意~，`懷~`有~`好意~`的~`不會~`來~。

h.p: lái zhě bù shàn shàn zhě bù lái

English: He who comes is surely ill-intentioned, no-one well-meaning will come (idiom).
Be careful not to trust foreigners.
